text: Nils Herlitz in 1948. Nils Herlitz (1888–1978)Sveriges dödbok 1947–2006, Sveriges Släktforskarförbund was a Swedish historian, legal scholar and politician of the Moderate Party. He served as the third President of the Nordic Council in 1955. He served as a member of the upper house of the Swedish parliament from 1939 to 1955. ==Honours== *Honorary doctorate, University of Oslo, 1961 == References == Category:Members of the Riksdag Category:Moderate Party politicians Category:1888 births Category:1978 deaths
title: Nils Herlitz
